traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Telepathic Pentacle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The Telepathic Pentacle has five heads. Whenever the Telepathic Pentacle takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The Telepathic Pentacle dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the Telepathic Pentacle grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The Telepathic Pentacle regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} when it grows new heads.

traits.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the Telepathic Pentacle has beyond one, it gets an extra {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} that can be used only for Opportunity Attacks.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Telepathic Pentacle makes as many Bite attacks as it has heads.

actions.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} +8, reach 10 ft. 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) Piercing damage.
